item.description:
I live in East Arlington, very close to Together In Motion This will be a kid friendly event as so many of us have those little monsters in our lives Wives, Husbands, GF, BF, BFF, etc are invited as well Bring a dish, beer, wine or just yourself I'll provide burgers, dogs, grilled veggies, soda. Great park at the end of the street where the kids can play Adults welcome to attempt to Pogo at their own risk

 

Saturday Works better for most

3:30 to around 6, then if anyone wants to go out afterwords we can

group.name: The Arlington Martial Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Planning a Cookout and BBQ at my home for us to get together on the 9th
